code: import React from'react';import{toast}from"react-hot-toast";import{apiConnector}from'../apiconnector';import{catalogData}from'../apis';export const getCatalogaPageData=async categoryId=>{const toastId=toast.loading("Loading...");let result=[];try{var _response$data;const response=await apiConnector("POST",catalogData.CATALOGPAGEDATA_API,{categoryId:categoryId});if(!(response!==null&&response!==void 0&&(_response$data=response.data)!==null&&_response$data!==void 0&&_response$data.success))throw new Error("Could not Fetch Category page data");result=response===null||response===void 0?void 0:response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response;console.log("CATALOG PAGE DATA API ERROR....",error);toast.error(error.message);result=(_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data;}toast.dismiss(toastId);return result;};
